article_title: Pegatron Earnings: Sales, Profit at Apple Supplier Rise; Margins Shrink
article_text:
TAIPEI—Being an Apple Inc. supplier can be both sweet and bitter.

Pegatron Corp. booked record third-quarter revenue on Monday, buoyed by orders for the iPhone 5C as it became the primary supplier of the smartphone for the first time. Its profit margins were squeezed, however, weighed down by costs for the rapid ramp-up in production.

The earnings result suggests what could be in store for other assemblers next year, as Apple...

twitter.description: Taiwan's Pegatron Corp. booked record third-quarter revenue thanks to orders for the iPhone 5C, but its margins were squeezed by higher costs from a ramp-up in production.
twitter.creator: @evadou

image.alt: Apple supplier Pegatron feels margin squeeze
